name: Matrix.val_planeConformalMatrix
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝ : Field R
a b : R
hab : Ne (HAdd.hAdd (HPow.hPow a 2) (HPow.hPow b 2)) 0
⊢ Eq (↑(Matrix.planeConformalMatrix a b hab)) (Matrix.of (Matrix.vecCons (Matrix.vecCons a (Matrix.vecCons (Neg.neg b) Matrix.vecEmpty)) (Matrix.vecCons (Matrix.vecCons b (Matrix.vecCons a Matrix.vecEmpty)) Matrix.vecEmpty)))
decl:
/-- The matrix [a, -b; b, a] (inspired by multiplication by a complex number); it is an element of
$GL_2(R)$ if `a ^ 2 + b ^ 2` is nonzero. -/
@[simps! (config := .asFn) val]
def planeConformalMatrix {R} [Field R] (a b : R) (hab : a ^ 2 + b ^ 2 ≠ 0) :
    Matrix.GeneralLinearGroup (Fin 2) R :=
  GeneralLinearGroup.mkOfDetNeZero !![a, -b; b, a] (by simpa [det_fin_two, sq] using hab)
